Tic Tac Toe

Speed Tic Tac Toe

Speed Tic Tac Toe is a fun variant of the traditional 3x3 board Tic Tac Toe. Simply hit start to begin the game, where you can enter player names and the length of the match. Make sure to make a decision before the 3 seconds though, otherwise you surrender your move to the computer's choice! Be ready because first turn is chosen randomly with icons rotating when multiple rounds are played!! Note: Reset button should strictly be used to clear the board before starting a new game via the start button.
